plays.text: Goal scored by Vincent Damphousse assisted by Owen Nolan and Scott Hannan
Penalty to Mike Rathje 2 minutes for Tripping Anson Carter
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Patrick Marleau
Penalty to Ryan Smyth 2 minutes for Hooking Scott Hannan
Penalty to Marcus Ragnarsson 2 minutes for Crosschecking Mike Comrie
Goal scored by Janne Niinimaa assisted by Jiri Dopita and Mike York
Penalty to Janne Niinimaa 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Marco Sturm
Penalty to Mike Ricci 2 minutes for Interference Eric Brewer
Goal scored by Marco Sturm assisted by Mike Rathje and Patrick Marleau
Penalty to Janne Niinimaa 2 minutes for Crosschecking Owen Nolan
Goal scored by Anson Carter assisted by Mike Comrie
Penalty to Mike Comrie 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Mike Ricci 2 minutes for Hooking Mike York
Goal scored by Owen Nolan assisted by Adam Graves
Penalty to Bryan Marchment 2 minutes for Interference Dan Cleary
Goal scored by Teemu Selanne assisted by Marco Sturm and Marcus Ragnarsson
Penalty to Patrick Marleau 2 minutes for Tripping Eric Brewer
Goal scored by Mike Comrie assisted by Anson Carter and Mike York
